constraint.description: No component must directly use Plexus Container
constraint.cypher: MATCH (p:Maven:Project) -[:CREATES]-> (a:Maven:Artifact) -[:DEPENDS_ON]-> (d {group: 'org.codehaus.plexus', name: 'plexus-container-default'}) RETURN DISTINCT p.groupId AS srcGroup, p.artifactId AS srcArtifact, d.version AS tgtVersion, d.group AS tgtGroup, d.name AS tgtArtifact
